name: Bluejay's Quest
description: Bluejay's Quest is a game about a bird on a quest to look for some breakfast eggs. Over the course of the adventure he gets stalked by an unknown entity. Join Bluejay in an adventure of flying, hopping, and gliding as you explore secret areas, dodge rocks, avoid predetory flies, and explore sewers. Do you have what it takes to beat this fast-paced adventure?
